## Changes compared to v26.0.0

- Kubernetes version change from 1.26.15 to 1.27.14
- cloud-provider-aws (formerly aws-cloud-controller-manager-app) from 1.26.11-gs1 to 1.27.7-gs1
- cluster-aws from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
